Name: Session
Definition: For experiment 0.1, the time when an animal is placed in the nesting cage until the time the animal is removed from the nesting cage.

Name: Trial
Definition: For experiment 0,.1 the time when an animal starts moving the wheel on a patch until the time a pellet is delivered. Every experiment 0.1 session ends on incompleted trials.

Name: Chunk
Definition: The length of time in which datastream files are written out. For experiment 0.1, each datastreams were written out in files corresponding to 1 hour chunks.
